document_data.name: The Mausoleum
document_data.mainbody: '''The Mausoleum''' was a tomb in [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It stood in an older part of Loudwater, on the bank of the [[Delimbiyr River]] and reached via a U-shaped passage with arches at its entrances, not far from [[Enalin's Shop of Adventurers' Supplies]].
document_data.Description: A dusty and long-abandoned space, it was home to [[Skeleton warrior|skeletal fighter]]s, [[zombie]]s, [[ghoul]]s, [[wight]]s, and [[wraith]]s.
document_data.History: In autumn in the {{yearlinkName|1358}}, [[undead]] emerged from the Mausoleum at nights and plagued the surrounding streets until [[adventurer]]s, possibly the returning [[Heroes of Ascore]], eliminated them. The thankful citizens returned to the area and gifted the heroes with a ''[[cloak of protection]] +2''.
